error.no_data: API connected but the response was empty

data_description.areas: Areas to display prices for according to Nord Pool market areas.
data_description.currency: Select currency to display prices in, EUR is the base currency.

authentication_error.message: There was an authentication error as you tried to retrieve data too far in the past.

connection_error.message: There was a connection error connecting to the API. Try again later.

entry_not_found.message: The Nord Pool integration is not configured in Home Assistant.

entry_not_loaded.message: The Nord Pool integration is currently not loaded or disabled in Home Assistant.

initial_update_failed.message: Initial update failed on startup with error {error}

no_day_data.message: Data for current day is missing

get_price_indices_for_date.description: Retrieves the price indices for a specific date.

resolution.description: Resolution time for the prices, can be any of 15, 30 and 60 minutes.
resolution.name: Resolution

get_price_indices_for_date.name: Get price indices for date

get_prices_for_date.description: Retrieves the prices for a specific date.

areas.description: One or multiple areas to get prices for. If left empty it will use the areas already configured.
areas.name: Areas

config_entry.description: The Nord Pool configuration entry for this action.
config_entry.name: Config entry

currency.description: Currency to get prices in. If left empty it will use the currency already configured.
currency.name: Currency

date.description: Only dates in the range from two months in the past to one day in the future are allowed.
date.name: Date

get_prices_for_date.name: Get prices for date
